questions.quote: Oh yeah. Every which way. Couldn't crunch the numbers. It drove me crazy.
Uhg. Well you hold it. Wait, uh, Damn It! I can't move it. God, I've never seen a zipper so stubborn. DAMN IT! I almost had it.
I wish he was not in a coma. I wish he was dead. I wish I could pull the plug out from him.
I know, finally. But George, guess who her boss is. Duncan Meyers.
I don't wanna get a movie hot dog! [in tears] I want a Papaya King hot dog!
Oh, yeah, right. I wish I had something on my mind.  So how about that Kramer, huh?
Actually she has a thing where she spirals her tongue around, it's like--
I know what I'm doin'. In fact Mr. Wilhelm gave me one of those little stress dolls. All right.  Back to work.
Listen, Joel, I don't think we should see each other anymore.
You're his friend. Better that she should sleep with someone else? Some jerk that he doesn't even know?
